titles.title: Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005
Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005
Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005
Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005
Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005
A bill to reauthorize the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Star Print ordered on on the bill.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Inhofe under authority of the order of the Senate of 07/29/2005 without amendment. With written report No. 109-124.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 195.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans.
Subcommittee on Fisheries and Oceans Discharged.
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 109-246.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 136.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Junior Duck Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2005 - Reauthorizes the Junior Duck Stamp Conservation and Design Program Act of 1994 through FY2010.
